https://doi.org/10.7927/0rvr-4538.Description: The Daily and Annual PM2.5 Concentrations for the Contiguous United States 1km Grids dataset provides daily (2000-2016) and annual PM2.5 concentrations in the US. These data may be useful in health-related research and environmental public health applications.
https://doi.org/10.7927/0rvr-4538.Project: Air Quality Data for Health-Related Applications

https://doi.org/10.7927/a4mb-4t86.Description: The Daily 8-hour Maximum and Annual O3 Concentrations for the Contiguous United States, 1-km Grids, v1 (2000_\u20132016) dataset provides daily 8-hour maximum and annual ground-level Ozone (O3) concentration data in the U.S. These data may be useful in air quality research and environmental public health research.
https://doi.org/10.7927/a4mb-4t86.Project: ADP - Air Quality Data for Health-Related Applications

https://doi.org/10.7927/weq9-pv30.Description: The Global Pesticide Grids contains agricultural pesticides data, which may be relevant to air and environmental quality.

https://dx.doi.org/10.5067/Aura/OMI/DATA.Description: The OMI AI from S-NPP/VIIRS dataset provides an AI that gives information on air quality and the presence of particles in the atmosphere. The product is available daily on Worldview at a 1 km resolution.

The OMI AI from S-NPP/VIIRS dataset provides an AI that gives information on air quality and the presence of particles in the atmosphere. The product is available daily on Worldview at a 1 km resolution.

https://aeronet.gsfc.nasa.gov/cgi-bin/dr.Description: AERONET Level 1.0 AOD Data are unscreened and may not have final calibration applied. These data may include preliminary data and are for 1993-2024.

https://search.earthdata.nasa.gov/search.Description: The VIIRS AOD at 6km from Earthdata Search dataset provides an important air quality record.

The VIIRS AOD at 6km from Earthdata Search dataset provides an aerosol optical depth layer. This product is a gridded AOD and is produced in a granule tiling format. The overall granule is divided into a 1 km equal 6, 3 km and 1 degree granule tiling. MODIS AOD data from Giovanni provides a time series of global AOD data.

https://so2.gsfc.nasa.gov/.Description: The Global Sulfur Dioxide Monitoring data is produced by NASA and distributed through the Giovanni data visualization system. These data are available in daily and 3-hourly snapshots and provide global coverage.
https://so2.gsfc.nasa.gov/.Project: Aura - Earth Observing System (EOS),Aura, Earth Observing System (EOS)

https://dx.doi.org/10.5270/S5P-hcp1l2m.Description: The Sentinel-5P satellite, a collaborative effort between the European Commission, the European Space Agency, the European Organisation for the Exploitation of Meteorological Satellites, and the European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts, produces global imagery for the distribution of various air quality products. Tropospheric Ozone is a subset of the total ozone in the atmosphere, the part of the atmosphere we breathe and is produced as a result of chemical reactions between pollutants from vehicle exhaust, gasoline vapors, and other emissions. These reactions are sped up by sunlight and occur more quickly in warmer temperatures. This dataset provides the three-day average of ozone columns in the tropical region between 20 degrees North and 20 degrees South.
https://dx.doi.org/10.5270/S5P-hcp1l2m.Project: CDS - Copernicus Data Information and Access Service (CDIAS)

https://doi.org/10.5067/40L92G8144IV.Description: The OMI AI from S-NPP/VIIRS dataset provides an AI that gives information on air quality and the presence of particles in the atmosphere. The product is available daily on Worldview at a 1 km resolution.

https://doi.org/10.5067/VIIRS/AERDB_L2_V.Description: The VIIRS (SNPP) <NAME> Aerosol NRT dataset provides aerosol data that may aid in air quality research. These data may aid in visualizing aerosol particle distribution in the atmosphere.
https://doi.org/10.5067/VIIRS/AERDB_L2_V.Project: AS4DI: Atmosphere System Research and Data Intensive Research (U.S.), AS-ACV: Air Quality, Health, and the Environment (U.S.), VISN: Impacts of Variability and Change on Air Quality and Health (U.S.),

https://worldview.earthdata.nasa.gov/?v=.Description: The Corrected Reflectance (True Color) from the Visible Infrared Imaging Radiometer Suite (VIIRS) provides a true color image of Earth from data on aerosols, which may be of use in air quality research.

https://disc.gsfc.nasa.gov/datacollectio.Description: The OMI AI from NASA GES DISC provides an AI (Aerosol Index) which gives information about different types of aerosols in the atmosphere. The product imagery is global and daily and the data coverage is from October 18, 2004. This dataset provides an overall aerosol measurement which may be useful in air quality research.
The OMI AI from S5P and OMDOAO-AI data provide surface UV aerosol index data that may aid in air quality research.
